connect20/diglin_username.name: connect20/Diglin_Username

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/diglin_username.description:
Create and login to an account thanks to a username AND email address.
Allow to disable an account from backend. The user will be blocked if the option in the customer backend is set to no
